slim_seo.title: High Tea + High Tops - The Drake
slim_seo.description: Pinkies up, kicks on. High Tea + High Tops is back at The Drake Hotel — stacked towers, boozy teapots + nostalgic vinyl, in collab with size? Canada, the authentic community sneaker store. Step into a Sunday like no other — where Chef Daniel’s delicious savoury + sweet towers meet handcrafted cocktails + Toronto’s best vinyl DJs spinning all afternoon. + $45 prix-fixe towers: min. 2 guests + Shareable boozy teapots + creative cocktails + All Vinyl Everything DJ sets: 11AM_3PM Swag giveaways with size? Canada partnership and exclusive raffles!
